"use client" import type React from "react" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../../contexts/AuthContext" import { skillsAPI, pointsAPI } from "../../services/api" import type { Skill } from "../../types" import { toast } from "react-toastify" import { StarIcon, ClockIcon, UserIcon, AcademicCapIcon, CurrencyDollarIcon, ArrowLeftIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline" const SkillDetail: React.FC = () => { const { id } = useParams<{ id: string }>() const navigate = useNavigate() const { user, isAuthenticated } = useAuth() const [skill, setSkill] = useState(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [enrolling, setEnrolling] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { if (id) { fetchSkill(Number.parseInt(id)) } }, [id]) const fetchSkill = async (skillId: number) => { try { setLoading(true) const skillData = await skillsAPI.getSkill(skillId) setSkill(skillData) } catch (error) { toast.error("Failed to fetch skill details") navigate("/skills") } finally { setLoading(false) } } const handleEnroll = async () => { if (!isAuthenticated) { toast.error("Please login to enroll in skills") navigate("/login") return } if (!skill) return if (user && user.points_balance < skill.points_required) { toast.error("Insufficient points. Please purchase more points.") navigate("/points") return } setEnrolling(true) try { await pointsAPI.createOrder(skill.id) toast.success("Successfully enrolled in skill!") navigate("/orders") } catch (error) { toast.error("Failed to enroll in skill") } finally { setEnrolling(false) } } const getDifficultyColor = (difficulty: string) => { switch (difficulty) { case "beginner": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800" case "intermediate": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800" case "advanced": return "bg-red-100 text-red-800" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800" } } if (loading) { return (
) } if (!skill) { return (

Skill not found

) } const isOwnSkill = user?.id === skill.instructor.id return (
{/* Back Button */}
{/* Header */}

{skill.title}

{skill.difficulty_level} {skill.category} {skill.is_active && ( Active )}
{skill.points_required} points
{skill.rating.toFixed(1)} ({skill.reviews_count} reviews)
{/* Instructor Info */}

{skill.instructor.first_name} {skill.instructor.last_name}

{skill.instructor.rating.toFixed(1)} instructor rating • {skill.instructor.skills_taught} skills taught
{/* Content */}
{/* Main Content */}

Description

{skill.description}

{/* Skill Details */}

Duration

{skill.duration_hours} hours

Difficulty

{skill.difficulty_level}

Points Required

{skill.points_required} points

Rating

{skill.rating.toFixed(1)} / 5.0

{/* Sidebar */}

Enroll in this Skill

{isOwnSkill ? (

This is your skill

) : ( <>
Cost: {skill.points_required} points
{user && (
Your balance: = skill.points_required ? "text-green-600" : "text-red-600" }`} > {user.points_balance} points
)}
{!isAuthenticated ? ( ) : user && user.points_balance < skill.points_required ? (

Insufficient points to enroll

) : ( )}

What you'll get:

  • • Direct access to instructor
  • • {skill.duration_hours} hours of learning
  • • Personalized guidance
  • • Certificate upon completion
)}
) } export default SkillDetail
